translations.Discover financial support to help you s: 探索助力您在日本学习的各类资金支持。
translations.MEXT Scholarship (Monbukagakusho): 日本文部科学省奖学金（MEXT）
translations.Who: Government-funded for undergraduate: 对象：政府资助的本科生及研究生
translations.Includes: Tuition, airfare, monthly stip: 资助内容：学费、机票、月度生活津贴
translations.Who: For short-term or exchange students: 对象：短期或交换留学生
translations.Includes: Monthly stipend (~¥80,000): 资助内容：月度生活津贴（约8万日元）
translations.Who: Offered by many private/public univ: 对象：由多所公立或私立大学提供
translations.How: Apply directly through the school: 申请方式：直接通过学校申请
translations.Address: 1-2-61 Koraku, Bunkyo City, Tok: 地址：日本东京都文京区后乐1-2-61，邮编123-0006
